attributes.action: Stay in office and ignore calls from opportunists to step down.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: gordon brown is the only viable option this country has of getting through this present crisis and i would urge him to resist calls from those that seek his demise. they seek only to further their own political careers and, in doing so, gamble with the very future of the labour party. there is no alternative to the present government and importantly present leader and if ever there was a time to stand firm it is now

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
